post.author: Rayne
post.body:
Just found this:


http://www.pullin-shapes.co.uk/index.htm


LSCM unwrap tool for Maya. Now I can die happy

post.author: tabre
post.body:
Oh awesome LSCM for Maya!. I will try it.

When I get home I will post the pelt mapping plugin I've been using. It's probably just as easy.

post.author: Rayne
post.body:
Oh, I'm going to uninstall the pelt mapping plugin I was using because with this you select borders, click "unwrap" and bam! Instant Uv's without the needs to set parameters and everything...

By the way, did you mean this?

http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/viewtopic.php?t=14094

post.author: tabre
post.body: ...wow yeah that's the same one I use. I'm going to have to check out this LSCM one though.
